Properties.Meta_Description_Description: Custom labels are displayed in the page editor for your convenience. You can change the generic name with a specific one only for this widget.

Controls the logic of the filters - whether all conditions should be true (AND) or whether one of the conditions should be true (OR).
Custom filter expression added to already selected filters.
Custom sort expression, used if default sorting is not suitable.
Disables the canonocal URL generation on widget level.
Controls whether the paging works with URL segments or a query parameter.
Template for the URL segments the widget's paging will work with. Use {{pageNumber}} for the current page number.
Template for the query parameter the widget's paging will work with.
